prompt: Design a dark-themed order history page with a black background and purple accent colors. The interface should feature 'Order History' as the main title in large white text at the top. Include a search bar with purple border and white text on dark background with a search icon. The order cards should have a dark gray background with purple borders, displaying order information in white and light gray text. Status badges should use bright colors (green for delivered, yellow for pending, red for cancelled) that stand out against the dark background. Product information should be clearly visible in light colors, and action buttons should have purple styling with white text.
